problem_names:
lemma in_set_simps: 
  "x \<in> set (y # z # ys) = (x = y \<or> x \<in> set (z # ys))"
  "x \<in> set ([y]) = (x = y)"
  "x \<in> set [] = False" 
  "Ball (set []) P = True" 
  "Ball (set [x]) P = P x" 
  "Ball (set (x # y # zs)) P = (P x \<and> Ball (set (y # zs)) P)"
lemma conj_weak_cong: "a = b \<Longrightarrow> c = d \<Longrightarrow> (a \<and> c) = (b \<and> d)"
translations:
lemma in_set_simps: 
  "x \<in> set (y # z # ys) = (x = y \<or> x \<in> set (z # ys))"
  "x \<in> set ([y]) = (x = y)"
  "x \<in> set [] = False" 
  "Ball (set []) P = True" 
  "Ball (set [x]) P = P x" 
  "Ball (set (x # y # zs)) P = (P x \<and> Ball (set (y # zs)) P)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((x \<in> set (y # z # ys)) = (x = y \<or> x \<in> set (z # ys)) &&&
     (x \<in> set [y]) = (x = y) &&& (x \<in> set []) = False) &&&
    Ball (set []) P = True &&&
    Ball (set [x]) P = P x &&&
    Ball (set (x # y # zs)) P = (P x \<and> Ball (set (y # zs)) P)
lemma conj_weak_cong: "a = b \<Longrightarrow> c = d \<Longrightarrow> (a \<and> c) = (b \<and> d)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>a = b; c = d\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (a \<and> c) = (b \<and> d)
